descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Each student in 330 "Topics" will complete a long-term project already underway since Spring 2016. This 330 "Topics" section functions in place of the independent study required for the Devising and Adaptation Module and the Senior Honors Thesis, and will be counted as an "approved option" for that independent study.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Quarter-long work on a Capstone Project, Devising and Adaptation Module Portfolio, or Senior Honors Thesis, based on a reading list developed in Fall 2016.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value:
ENROLLMENT. Approx. 6. Admission will be limited to students who have already begun work with the instructor on long-term projects. These include:
(1) students completing the SoC Devising and Adaptation Module, who must complete a Capstone Project by the end of Winter 2017 and a Module Portfolio by the middle of Spring 2017, under the direction of the instructor;
(2) selected production assistants for the Capstone Project;
(3) Senior Honors Thesis students who must complete a thesis by early Spring 2017, under the direction of the instructor.
PERMISSION OF INSTRUCTOR IS REQUIRED.
